Class CollisionBitMask

   in CollisionBitMask.h
   in CollisionBitMask.cpp
class CollisionBitMask

CollisionBitMask is used to test for collisions between objects based on their images

Constructor Summary
CollisionBitMask( const void* sourcePixels, int w, int h )
          Constructs a CollisionBitMask from pixel data

CollisionBitMask

public CollisionBitMask( const void* sourcePixels, int w, int h );
Constructs a CollisionBitMask from pixel data
Parameters:
sourcePixels - 32bit alpha channeled pixels
w - the width of the image
h - the height of the image
